attributes.comment:
Please, Please, consider the amount of cost that is associated with the adoption
process and please reconsider your raising of these prices. We have already
been out more than it should take to adopt a child. The china adoptions have
now been extended and we have to again redo the process. This is costly plus
now you have decided to raise it more. Our budgets are really tight.

This is also a disservice to the ones who want to adopt behind me. THey also
will have to pay the larger amounts. If there is one rule I would like to see
is to extend the length of the document.

Please reconsider 66% is too much
Thanks for listening
Hank Bowles
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Henry Bowles
